page.title: 17OTHER SMALL LOCAL INDUSTRY
page.content: On the outskirts of the northern parts of Oakham are a number of small businesses. The Springfields Hotel, a Pets Hotel and Riding Stables have been constructed out of the remains of a derelict house and out_buildings. Nearby is Hillside Farm: the house occupied by a furniture repairer and restorer; though the out_buildings and land are still ussed as a farm. The woodworker retired from the navy, started wood_working as a hobby which grew into a flourishing 'cottage industry'. In Ashwell there is a garden centre where the usual range of plants and goods are on offer. There is also a garage run by Victor Woods: this provides petrol as well as new and second_hand cars
